name: Fatal Runtime
description:
On a night shift unlike any other, the Head Nurse specializing in virtual care encounters a virus that might be beyond his abilities to treat...

CONTROLS

Arrows / WASD= Move 

SPACE, Z or ENTER = Examine / Advance text

F4 / ALT+ENTER = Fullscreen 

ESC, X = Menu / Cancel/Erase (text)

Mouse control is also enabled!

For bug reports, please contact us for a quick fix!

https://twitter.com/burgerphones

--------------------------------------------
